name: CorFlight School
about: CorFlight School, located in Córdoba, Spain, is a premier aviation training institution offering a comprehensive and high-quality education in flight training. With a team of highly experienced instructors and state-of-the-art simulators, CorFlight provides a range of specialized courses, including the Integrated ATPL, Cadet Program, UPRT, and commercial pilot training. The school's strategic location at the Córdoba International Airport ensures uninterrupted and focused training. CorFlight is integrated within the EASA system, allowing students to train and test across various European countries. The school also offers theoretical knowledge exams and a supportive learning environment, making it an ideal choice for aspiring aviators seeking professional expertise and cultural enrichment. With a strong commitment to quality and student success, CorFlight School is the perfect launchpad for your aviation career.
services:
["PRIVATE PILOT COURSE PPL
ATPL (A) ONLINE COURSE
